name: tostring
description: Converts any value to its string representation. Useful for debugging and displaying variable values.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to convert to a string

returns.description: The string representation of the value

example:
-- Convert numbers to strings
local num = 42
print("Number: " .. tostring(num))

-- Convert objects to strings
local player = GetPlayerEntity(somePlayer)
print("Entity: " .. tostring(player))

-- Convert nil values
local empty = nil
print("Empty: " .. tostring(empty)) -- Prints "nil"

-- Convert boolean values
local isActive = true
print("Active: " .. tostring(isActive))
notes: Objects are converted to JSON string representation
Essential for string concatenation with non-string values
